headline: CNN Live Event/Special
subHeadline: Interview With Lisa of Blackpink; Hong Kong Celebrates 2025. Aired 11-11:30a ET

utterances.speaker: BRIANNA KEILAR, CNN HOST
utterances.sentences: Beautiful fireworks over Victoria Harbor, lighting up the sky there, and, Kristie, really, really living up to that theme, the Symphony of Happiness.I feel like that was Hong Kong laying down the gauntlet, saying, hey, world, match this. And it's going to be very difficult. (LAUGHTER)

utterances.speaker: LU STOUT
utterances.sentences: You're right. 2025 has got to be a better year. We're telling you so.And did you see some of the pyrotechnic displays just now? Did you see the hearts, the lasers, and, as promised, the rainbow smoke with the silver fireworks? Brianna, it was like an '80s teenage dream. And the pyrotechnic master here in Hong Kong delivered tonight. And, as you like to point out, and I'm just going to rub it in, I'm already in the future, baby. It is 2025 here in Hong Kong. From the future, I'm wishing you and all our crews a happy new year.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: I will say, Kristie, it is looking bright and glittery there in 2025, sparkly and fresh and new.

utterances.speaker: LU STOUT
utterances.sentences: And the party, Brianna, it doesn't end tonight, because, just a couple weeks from now, the end of January is going to be the lunar new year. So expect more fireworks, more big crowds, more big parties, as we usher in the year of the snake, more celebration ahead.But, for the meantime, let's just revel in the fact that I'm already in the future. It's 2025. Boom. Brianna, thank you so much. Take care.

utterances.speaker: KEILAR
utterances.sentences: And a happy new year to you, Kristie.

utterances.speaker: LU STOUT
utterances.sentences: Happy new year to you, my friend.And, please, to everyone watching, keep it here, because, still ahead, there's more parties to come. We know Bangkok, they know how to party, as they are getting ready to say goodbye to 2024 and ring in the new year. And Will Ripley is joining us from Bangkok, where he just wrapped up an amazing interview. Will, tell us all about it.

utterances.speaker: LU STOUT
utterances.sentences: My friends, you are looking at Hong Kong and Taipei welcoming 2025 with spectacular style.Just a few minutes ago here in Hong Kong, the stunning light show is meant to convey hopes for happiness in the new year, as well as wishes for prosperity and the promise of new beginnings. And, as you can see, it did not disappoint. Now, Thailand, Laos, Vietnam, Cambodia, and parts of Indonesia are all up next. They're going to ring in the new year just over a half-an- hour from now. [11:20:10] And I want to take you back to Bangkok, where huge street parties are under way. Locals and tourists alike are gearing up for an unforgettable fireworks and traffic, as the anticipation there is building by the minute, as revelers there watch the clock tick down. Now, my pal Will Ripley joins us now once again live from Bangkok, where, again, the excitement is building. And, Will, just a few moments ago, you got to talk to a global headliner there in the kingdom, Lisa from Blackpink. What did she share with you?

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Oh, you know what she is prettier and even nicer in person than she comes across on screen, which is pretty incredible, because she has 105 million followers on Instagram alone. By population, that would make it the 15th largest country in the world.And yet she was incredibly humble, talking about the fact that she's actually nervous here at ICONSIAM in Bangkok tonight, where, for the first time, she's the headliner for a New Year's Eve countdown. Yes she's been a headliner at Coachella. She's filled stadiums. She's been performing with Blackpink for years, but, tonight, she is here solo. And just minutes ago, we were able to speak with her exclusively. (BEGIN VIDEOTAPE)

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: I'm here with Lisa. And I think I have to pinch myself that I'm actually seeing you in person. It's so nice to meet you. Thank you for taking the time.How does it feel to be back in Bangkok, where this all began when you were 13 and auditioning to join Blackpink?

utterances.speaker: LISA, MUSICIAN
utterances.sentences: No, it's always good to be back in Thailand to see my family and friends. So I'm so happy to be back.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: I met a couple of your super fans outside, and -- Vivian and Sasa. And they wanted me to ask you what you miss the most about Thailand.

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: What I miss the most about Thailand, I would say food, Thai food. You know, like when you go out of Thailand, you find -- try to find good Thai food, but, sometimes, it doesn't have like the real taste.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: It's hard to find.

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: Yes, it's really hard to find, yes.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Do you have a favorite food that we can tell -- share people what it is, your favorite dish?

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: My favorite Thai dish?

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Thai dish, yes. LISA

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: You recommend?

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: Tom yum kung. I recommend Tom yum kung, and, like, pad thai.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Oh, of course...

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: Pad thai, of course.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: ... which is my favorite.

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: I have had pad thai probably three times already since I have been here. I have been here only three days.

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: I had pad thai today as well.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: You did?

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: Yes, before show.(LAUGHTER)

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: So this is your first countdown performance. You have done Coachella. You have head -- I mean, you have filled stadiums. How does it feel to be here at ICONSIAM and to be the headliner in your hometown with, like, tens of thousands of people? The streets are packed. The hotels are full.

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: I know.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Everybody's talking about you being here.

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: I'm super nervous and excited at the same time, because it's my first -- like what you said, it's my first countdown show ever.And it happened to be in Thailand, so it's more meaningful to me and to my fans as well.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: I mean, people -- you mean so much to people that I have been speaking to. Just they're so proud of you and you give them hope and inspiration.So do you have any message for your fans that are here, that are watching this?

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: Well, I just want everyone to be happy. And right now, we're -- go towards the new year, so maybe next year, have, like, good things come in, in...

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Speaking of good things...

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: ... you have had an amazing year. You're wrapping up an amazing year. What do you have planned for 2025?

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: Oh, there's a lot. I have like a full list.Well, I'm releasing my full -- my first full album soon, in February 28.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Wow.

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: And I'm having a first debut, acting debut.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: "White Lotus."

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: With the "White Lotus" season three.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Oh, my God, I saw the preview. It looked really -- you were, like, right there. It looked amazing.You should check it out if you haven't seen it.

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: Yes, and also Coachella.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Wow.

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: This is my solo performance, Coachella, the first time.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: So it's just first after first and you're just killing it with everything. I can't believe you said earlier you get nervous. I can't imagine you being nervous, because we see you just so flawless.

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: Oh, no, I'm a good actor.(LAUGHTER)

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Fake it until you make it is what I used to...(LAUGHTER)

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: That's right.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Well, you're doing amazing. And it's such an honor to meet you.Congratulations. Happy new year. Anything else you want to say before we say goodbye?

utterances.speaker: LISA
utterances.sentences: Well, happy new year everyone.(LAUGHTER) (END VIDEOTAPE)

utterances.speaker: LU STOUT
utterances.sentences: Oh, my gosh. Enjoy the show, Will Ripley. And thank you for bringing us the interview.Lisa is so talented, so charming. She has a huge year ahead. She's got Coachella. She's got a new album, her acting debut on HBO. Will, thank you so much. And, if you can, go enjoy the party. We will talk again soon, all right? Will Ripley joining us live from Bangkok.

utterances.speaker: RIPLEY
utterances.sentences: Thanks, Kristie.
